snippet.title: ARPG Kristala Early Access PC Release OUT MEOW!
snippet.description:
The cat is officially (and fully) out of the bag!

The Early Access PC release for Dark Fantasy ARPG Kristala is AVAILABLE MEOW on Steam, with console releases for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch to come following a full Steam launch in 2025.

Seamlessly blending elements of magic, stealth, and parkour, Kristala transports you into the world of Ailur as a fledgling feral warrior tasked with harnessing the power of six ancient, sacred Kristals. Battle your way across Ailur using an arsenal of fierce attacks, feline skills, deadly weapon abilities, and an explosive mix of up to 16 spells at one time.

Your goal? Uncover the source of a terrible curse that has mutated the planet’s once-docile creatures into deadly monsters. Only the fiercest warriors will have what it takes to master the Sacred Six, restore peace to Ailur, and join ranks with the highly esteemed Raksaka warriors.

Frequent patches and updates will be shared via Steam's event announcement system as new fixes and content implementations are pushed to Episode 1 of the release.

-   -   -   -   -

Are you game? Come, Traveler…the Kristals are calling.

Buy MEOW on Steam! ⬇️⬇️⬇️
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1206410/Kristala/

-   -   -   -   -

#darkfantasy #actionrpg #soulslike #indiegame #cats
